sen.j: 中村 松江（なかむら まつえ）は、歌舞伎役者。
sen.e: "Matsue NAKAMURA" is a name which has been used by several Kabuki (a traditional form of drama and music performed by male actors) actors.
sen.cmt: ここでは特定の一人の役者のことを説明しているのではなく、複数の役者に使用されてきた「名前」について言及しているため、そのことが明確になるように訳出いたしました。
sen.e: "Matsue NAKAMURA" is a name which has been used by several Kabuki (a traditional form of drama and music performed by male actors) actors.
"Matsue NAKAMURA" is a name which has been used by several Kabuki (a traditional form of drama and music performed by male actors) actors.

sen.j: - 中村歌右衛門 (3代目)の養子。
sen.e: He was an adopted son of Utaemon NAKAMURA the Third.

He is the eldest son of Tozo NAKAMURA the Sixth.
sen.cmt: 現在活躍中の役者のため、現在形で表記いたしました。
sen.e: He is the eldest son of Tozo NAKAMURA the Sixth.
He is the eldest son of Tozo NAKAMURA the Sixth.

sen.j: 先名4代目中村玉太郎から、2006年（平成18年）4月に襲名。
sen.e: He succeeded to the name in April 2006 and changed his name from his previous stage name Tamataro NAKAMURA the Fourth to Matsue NAKAMURA.
He succeeded to the name in April 2006 and changed his name from his previous stage name Tamataro NAKAMURA the Fourth to Matsue NAKAMURA.
